Title: Extends unfair labor practice protection to state grant recipients
Summary: Extends application of the NYS labor relations act and unfair labor practice protections to state grant recipients who act in the capacity of employers; permits a contracting state agency to cancel payments to a grant recipient upon a second or subsequent labor violation; defines "state grant recipient".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to extending the application of the New York state labor relations act to state grant recipients
